name: Epic Adventure
description:
Epic Adventure is a spiritual successor to the original Adventure for the Atari 2600, with similar gameplay but with upgraded graphics.

You need to recapture the Golden Chalice and return it to your castle . The Chalice is now protected by orcs, a cave troll, a dragon, a hawk that steals your stuff, and potentially the evil magician.

The Chalice is hidden in one of three places. You can find many items to help you, including a sword, a skeleton key, a staff, and an amulet that makes you invisible to enemies.

The game has three skill levels:

Level 1: Items are in fixed locations close to your castle. Two hits to kill the Dragon, one hit to kill the Troll. No Evil Magician. Level 2: Items are in fixed locations throughout the Kingdom. Three hits to kill the Dragon, two hits to kill the Troll. Evil Magician present. Level 3: Items are in randomized locations. Three hits to kill the Dragon, two hits to kill the Troll. Evil Magician present.
